author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Another quick round of automatic BuildFile.xml cleaning to improve the modularity of CMSSW.

Now, all of the Reco* Build files don't use dependencies anymore which are not included in the source files.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles. It was checked that all newly added dependencies are actually required by the package with `git grep`.
title: Remove remaining unneeded dependencies from Reco subsystems
